titleStmt.title: M. Graham to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG14284

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 10

body.p:
Head Quarters 11. Ky Cavalry
Lexington Ky Oct 17th 1864
His Excellency
Governor Thos E. Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Governor:

I have the honor to make the following recommendation for promotion in this Regt
First Sergt B. F. Lewis to be 2nd Lieut Co "K" vice Chas H. harris resigned to date July 1st 1864

I am Govr
Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
M. Graham
Col 11. Ky Cavalry

11 Cavy
Hd Qrs 11th Ky Cavl
Lexington Ky
Oct 17th 1864
Graham M
Col 11th Cavl
Recommends Sergt B F Lewis be comd 2d Lt Co K vice Harris resigned, to date July 1st 1864
Issue
D W Lindsey
Inspt & Adj Genl

Coms issd & forwd
Oct 21, 1864
L B No 7. 1864 p 347-
Recd A. G. O 21st Oct 1864
